H3.text: who owns and operates the panama canal today. Panama

A6.text: Since then, the canal has been administered by the Panama Canal Authority (Autoridad de Canal de Panama, or ACP).

A7.text: the process which was finally completed on 31 December 1999.

A8.text: The Panama Canal is defined by law as an inalienable patrimony of the Republic of Panama.

A9.text: The Panama Canal Authority is established under Title XIV of the National Constitution, and has exclusive responsibility for the operation, administration, management, preservation, maintenance, and modernization of the canal.
